title: Dale Bell, The Snitch Team
description: According to Marx, the proletariat is going to achieve class consciousness any day now. When it does, will you survive the ensuing worldwide revolution?QUIZ: Will You Survive The Inevitable Uprising Of The Proletariat?

am.title: American Imperialist
am.description: The worker knows no country! You’d be purged almost immediately.

in.title: Intelligentsia
in.description: The state has no need for intellectuals! Your days of discussing theories while honest workers toil is over. You’ll be sent to the countryside to get some honest work and “reeducating” done. But technically you survived. Congratulations?

pr.title: Prole
pr.description: Congratulations! You’re a true prole and you’d survive the revolution! At least until someone tries an attempt at collectivised farming and you die in a massive famine.

questions.prompt: After a long day of living in the capitalist hellscape you return home and grab your favorite drink. What is it?

answers.text: La Croix Sparkling Water
Good ol’ American Coca Cola
Fiji water, its artisanal
Coffee

questions.prompt: What is the greatest nation on Earth?

answers.text: Monaco, my family has a summer home there
‘MURICA
Uruguay, seriously look them up
I know no nations, only my fellow workers

questions.prompt: How much does a banana cost?

answers.text: That sounds like a question for my butler
Banana? Are you some sort of vegan? I only eat beef
You know there used to be multiple species of banana, but today, only the cavendish remains. What was the question?
The livelihoods and democracies of several Latin American countries
What is “job?”
Farming government subsidies, uh, I mean corn
Philosophy, I mean I wait tables, but really philosophically. What is a table, if you think about it?
Why I’m a [insert dying industry here]
Monopoly
Risk, I always try to be in the U.S.
Chess
Checkers
The Most Dangerous Game, if you know what I mean
American Football, none of that crazy European shit
Chess
Mining coal

questions.prompt: How would you describe your fashion?

answers.text: Pre-ripped and muddied jeans. So I’m authentic
I only wear things with American flags on ‘em
Turtlenecks
Overalls

questions.prompt: What is your favorite Snitch article?

answers.text: Virtual Vacation App Sends Surly Frenchman To Your House To Blow Cigarette Smoke In Your Face
With Time Running Out To Achieve Middle East Peace, Panicked Kushner Advocates Zero State Solution
After Years Of Therapy, Null Hypothesis Opens Up About Fear Of Rejection
Bus Driver Rules Like Dictator Of Small Communist Country

questions.prompt: Which of the following is the most communist?

answers.text: When my servant does not fetch my baton - scandalous!
Those damn liberals!!!
The common ownership of the means of production and the absence of social classes, money, and the state.
I don’t know much about political doctrines

questions.prompt: What is your favorite news source?

answers.text: Wall Street Journal
One America News!
The Snitch
Wikipedia

questions.prompt: What's the streaming service you use most?

answers.text: HBO Max
NRA TV
I only watch live theatre
YouTube
Money is the root of all evil, which is why I have plenty
Money is the root of all evil; therefore poor people should have none
Money is the root of all evil, in theory
Money is the root of all evil, which is why we must destroy capitalism

questions.prompt: What search engine do you use?

answers.text: I use one not available to the public yet
Google, they deserve that monopoly!
DuckDuckGo, it protects your data!
Bing, it got on my computer and I can’t afford the anti-virus software to get it off
